thread.title: Kym Marsh shocks onlookers after having a ‘huge meltdown’ at London hotel
thread.title_full: Kym Marsh shocks onlookers after having a ‘huge meltdown’ at London hotel

author: dcoombs
title: Kym Marsh shocks onlookers after having a ‘huge meltdown’ at London hotel
text:
'DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM?' Kym Marsh shocks onlookers after having a ‘huge meltdown’ at London hotel 
Hotel staff were on the receiving end of a tirade from the actress after she failed to get her key working properly Exclusive From LAURA ARMSTRONG and EMMA BRANKIN'S Biz on Sunday column 5th February 2017, 12:29 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments GUESTS at a posh London hotel must have thought they were in Weatherfield when Corrie star KYM MARSH threw an almighty wobbly in the lobby. 
Onlookers were shocked to see the actress, who plays Michelle Connor in the soap, lose her temper with staff at the InterContinental Hotel – and bust out the cringeworthy line: “Don’t you know who I am?” Getty Images - WireImage Kym Marsh caused a scene instead of acting in one after her hotel key stopped working 
One said: “Kym had come back from the National Television Awards and gone out for a cigarette. 
“But when she got back to her room the key wouldn’t work. Staff wouldn’t let her in the room without ID but she didn’t have any on her. 
“She was pretty unimpressed, to say the least, and caused a bit of a scene. Related Stories Kym Marsh relives heartache of giving birth to her stillborn son Archie This beats the Rovers Corrie's Kym Marsh and Connor McIntyre lead the pack as they head to London for the NTAs 'I CAN BE PROUD' Coronation Street's Kym Marsh admits she 'revisited some dark places' with miscarriage storyline LOVE RIVALS NO MORE Kym Marsh reveals why she's finally healed bitter feud with Hollyoaks' Steph Waring COBBLES CONTROVERSIES From a sex tape to child rape allegations, 5 scandals that have rocked Coronation Street 
At one point she said, ‘Don’t you know who I am?’ and seemed really angry. 
She felt that the staff were being unreasonable but they genuinely had no idea who she was. ITV Kym Marsh has been praised for her Coronation Street miscarriage storyline 
“Eventually she had to call and get the team from Corrie to rescue her.” 
Presumably the receptionist was an Emmerdale fan. 
We hear the Dingles are always given VIP treatment at London’s five-star establishments. Zenpix
